result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott R Kroner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Robbery, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. $278  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervison or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
Defendant not to use or possess any dangerous weapon.
Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription. Banned from Firehouse Subs on Emil St, Madison, WI.
Random UA & BA testing at discretion of agent.

timeConds.notes: With huber. Credit does NOT apply.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott R Kroner

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: filed by Dane County Sheriff's Office (DCSO) for Revocation of Huber Privileges.
Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  Judgment of conviction prepared.

Reporter:  digital recorder - 1:33
  Def waived reading of Information.  Def by Counsel enters a plea of NG.  Motions due w/i 20 days; bail continued.

Defendant in court with Attorney Dennis E. Burke.  Joshua M. Bowland appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing signed.
and Notice of DNA and Witness List (Plaintiff's)
Status conference on October 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
  - Defendant shall not be at Firehouse Subs.
  - Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon.
  - Defendant shall not consume alcohol.
  - Defendant shall not use or possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription.
  - The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.
  If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $5000 (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
  Defendant waived the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial judge -  Br 12

Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney  State Public Defender.  Adrienne E. Blais appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for October 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
